attributes.action: bring legislative justice to the Coroner's system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please ensure that under proposed Coroner's Reform 'pre-hearing' review meetings are always made available for participants at Inquests. These meetings are to agree key documentation which must be made avaiable in a timely manner to allow the Coroner, the family, counsel and the jury adequate time to read and absorb information pertaining to the deceased and the reasons for their death. Coronial Reform must also address possible handover of case notes from HM Coroner to HM Deputy Coroner,and this handover situation must be agreed within clear time limits. This situation must be clearly defined within legislation and subject to appeal if not adhered to.
